ViewObject.Name: WOEvents
ViewObject.SelectList: R5events.EVT_ACD, R5events.EVT_CLASS, R5events.EVT_CLASS_ORG, R5events.EVT_CODE, R5events.EVT_COMPLETED, R5events.EVT_COSTCODE, R5events.EVT_CREATED, R5events.EVT_CREATEDBY, R5events.EVT_DATE, R5events.EVT_DESC, R5events.EVT_ENTEREDBY, R5events.EVT_JOBTYPE, R5events.EVT_OBJECT, R5events.EVT_OBJECT_ORG, R5events.EVT_ORG, R5events.EVT_ORIGIN, R5events.EVT_REPORTED, R5events.EVT_RSTATUS, R5events.EVT_RTYPE, R5events.EVT_SHIFT, R5events.EVT_START, R5events.EVT_STATUS, R5events.EVT_TYPE, R5events.EVT_UPDATED, R5events.EVT_UPDATEDBY, R5events.ITS_ESTID, R5events.ITS_ISADF, R5events.ITS_ISASSET, R5events.ITS_ISPM, R5events.ITS_NOTE, R5events.ITS_ACCOUNTRATEID, R5events.ITS_REVIEWED, R5events.ITS_REVIEWEDBY, R5events.ITS_REVIEWDT, R5events.ITS_PERFORMDT, R5events.ITS_PERFORMED, R5events.ITS_PERFORMEDBY, (select nvl(Txv_Percent,0) from R5TAXRATEVALUES t,MRLT_ACCOUNTMASTER m where Txv_Rate='LAX' and m.PARTTAX='Y' and R5EVENTS.EVT_COSTCODE= m.ACCTNUM) AS tTaxPerc

ViewAttribute.Name: tTaxPerc
ViewAttribute.Expression: select nvl(Txv_Percent,0) from R5TAXRATEVALUES t,MRLT_ACCOUNTMASTER m where Txv_Rate='LAX' and m.PARTTAX='Y' and R5EVENTS.EVT_COSTCODE= m.ACCTNUM
